website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for anyone who is either new to this type of lawn tool, or prefers a model by Fiskars that also comes with price tag that's the lowest in the brand's family of reel mowers.
pros: The most affordable model by the brand
Build feels durable like the other reel mower models by Fiskars
cons: A bit less powerful than the other 2 options by Fiskars
but if you want the most budget-friendly option, you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. I'm 75 years old
customer_reviews.text: First Spring Mowing.. large yard, steep yard, bumpy... about an hour to cut. Heart was beating. I loved it. I'm 75 years old, used to be a runner, just walk now. 35 years ago, I put away a riding mower for a power walk behind, what the heck I needed excercise... it died last year, decided to try it this.. It's great for the environmentalistic, exercise loving person that I am..
customer_reviews.author: RG smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this lawnmower. My husband warned me that it wouldn’t meet my expectations. Unfortunately he was right. The blades are sharp and I thought it would be great. But unless you have nice grass with no weeds, you should probably stay away from this one. We live in the country and have dandelions and other weeds. I didn’t think they would be a problem, but for some reason the lawn mower won’t cut them. It just bends them over and sort of flattens them. I tried going over them several times with no luck. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Cuts really well.
customer_reviews.text: After using it several times, I would say that it has met my expectations on all fronts. I'm pretty good at assembling things and I found it easy to put together, if you follow the step by step instructions and use reasonable force on the fasteners. Laying it out on a bench makes it easier, still. It is sharp enough to cut paper easily. Not too light, or too heavy, making it sturdy but not difficult for this 70 year old to push (if you mow your lawn regularly). Good exercise and good for the environment, which I like. If you're on the fence about getting a manual push mower, I'd say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Forrester, found

customer_reviews.title: Do it yourself assembly is a horror.
customer_reviews.text: It comes completely disassembled. It's not just inserting the handle, you have to put together the entire wheel assembly and much more. If you're not inclined to this kind of task, this is not the product for you. I read the instruction booklet and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Best reel mower I have ever used! Very well made, solid and easy to put together and use!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with my Fiskars stay sharp reel mower. It is excellent! It was very easy to put together. I did it in 15-20 minutes by myself. It it easy to push and the blades clip the wispy fine grass so well! I love this mower and I will never go back to a bulky electric mower again! It takes me no time to mow and I barely break a sweat. This mower is made very well and is going to last a long time. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Wheel broke off
customer_reviews.text: Had for less than a year--and probably less than 10 mows--when wheel broke off :( Can't find a way to replace it. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Upon assembling, realized that one of the front wheels was broken, which caused uneven mowing. Contacted Fiskars Customer Service via email on their website, and they immediately sent an entirely new mower to replace the damaged one. I was impressed at how quick and easy it was to get a replacement (for free). Thank you again. As for the new mower, it works a lot better than my previous reel mower. I am very happy and be assured that if you buy this and have any issues, the customer service will be a pleasure to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Ok at best
customer_reviews.text: It cuts bermuda pretty well, but does not handle many weed varieties and simply doesn't cut. Does not cut when backing up. Also the maintenance suggested is pretty complicated based on video I watched. A 20 minute video. Great for the planet, but unless you have a very clean lawn, I'd not suggest. For same price the greenworks corded is far better at cut, and a better compromise from gas.
customer_reviews.author: dan cooke

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now- it works beautifully!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how great this mower is. It is easier to push than my electric and quite a bit lighter. I have back problems so that is a huge bonus for me. It maneuvers easily and cuts like butter! There is nothing I don't like about it...buy it now!! It's also a piece of cake to put together!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lil.annie

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and non-existent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality product and non-existing customer support. After first two uses the wheel consistently falls off with no way to fix it. This flaw makes the product unusable. When it was in working shape, it was just mediocre cutting grass unevenly. I reached out to customer service multiple times and absolutely no response. It’s been months now and no resolution. I was also excited to bring a set of clippers from this company but after a few uses they broke. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Skrippy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for lawn mowing in my backyard. Easy to push and provides a clean, healthy cut to the blades of grass. Adjustments for different height levels are easy to manage. Although I pay for lawn care in the front yard, I may reconsider the cost savings. No more grass tearing, gasoline, electric cord or noise.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars Mower
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very well made, lot's of height adjustments, very easy to push...even on uneven terrain. My grandkids fought over who got to use it to mow the lawn. For someone with a small to medium sized lawn, this would work well...and no fuel, no noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when it first arrived. It did a nice job on the lawn, but after only a handful of uses, it's already shedding bolts. I was able to find an adequate replacement at Ace, but you'll probably want to tighten all of them after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good. Can be Great with a few improvements from the company.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works as advertised. Cuts though sticks and twigs. I have yet to ram this with a stick or anything. Its very very hard to do. Not too heavy. Blades are sharp *initially* Cons. Wheels have horrible traction. Gets jammed on hills occasionally. Biggest and worst part about this is it doesn't cut if you pull it backwards. Because of the reason above you need to go up hills 2 times at-least. Overall I kept this. It works well for the most part but the hill part really hurts. I wouldn't buy this again unless they made it drive the blades when you pulled it or it traveled backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Kago

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for seniors (in my opinion) but cuts short grass well
customer_reviews.text: This mower is built like a tank but unfortunately, It's also as heavy as one. I'm 67 and this is too heavy to lift and move. If cutting tall grass, you may need to cut the area a few times to get a good cut. If you're young and in great shape, this would probably be the perfect reel mower. I'm really surprised a bag is not included for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, cuts great if the grass is a reasonable height, long grass you will go back and forth many times. Sticks kill the spin use for boot to reverse the blades and keep cutting. Uphill is a great workout, flats just fun, as you cut grass and hear the birds singing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little reel mower
customer_reviews.text: This mower is nice. It's sturdy, but not too heavy. It's quiet as a mouse and doesn't ever not start. It is perfect for the small grass areas of our yard. Neither my wife nor I have a hard time pushing it uphill or over tall grass. It was pretty easy to put together, and takes up very little space in the garage. However, it is definitely a small yard mower. A really big yard would take a while. Worth noting: It only cuts forward; you cannot pull it backwards over a spot to hit it again. You must approach the area you want to cut from the front.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy hill

customer_reviews.title: it is a workout
customer_reviews.text: be prepared, the blades are sharp, and it does a bang up job of cutting grass, but avoid high grass, as it will test you...you will need to be in shape, this is not as easy as described, but it does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Terry Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bolts loosen and call out of back wheels, otherwise would be great.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until the black wheel fell off. The attachment for them is kind of crap and the bolts loosen and eventually drop out during use. It's not broken but the bolt fell out somewhere in the lawn and until I find or replace it, this thing is dead in the water.
customer_reviews.author: AverageConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Thick metal bent and can't use it of the box!
customer_reviews.text: This Fiskars reel mower came damaged. Not a broken piece of plastic or scratches but the small wheel holder, a quarter inch of metal is bent and can't be used at all. Really disappointed for the amount of money this product cost for an issue like this to come in an unscratched box. There's no way that thick of a piece of metal was bent during shipping and nothing else damaged. Not sure if faulty machinery or poor assembly. I will being willing to change my review depending on the hassle and quickness of return of replacement parts. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have this mower!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun little mower. I felt like a kid again pushing it around. It is adjustable for different levels of cutting. The blades are very sharp and cut well. No gas- no electricity needed.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Good for small yards
customer_reviews.text: This unit was packaged well and easy to assemble, however, it's not as easy to push as I thought it would be. Of course, I'm new to push mowers and my expectations may have been unrealistic. It also didn't come with a grass catcher so I have to rake afterward. I'm thankful that I only have a small patch of grass in the backyard. There's a curbing around the lawn which the mower can't get close enough to in order to cut the grass, so I had to get a string trimmer as well. I was hoping this would be simpler but the $30 monthly fee for a gardener doesn't seem so bad anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth, C

customer_reviews.title: You'll be happy you bought this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: well I never have used a reel mower ! I did alot of research before purchasing this mower...It got great reviews... ---It just arrived...out of the box, very easy directions to follow..put together not great tech skills for me...still piece of cake! ---Delievered very timely, and in great shape ---Mowed about a half acre...grass was long, and a mixture of clover,and assorted grass (New England)... ----Buzzed right throught it....----Not hard to push, but good work out.... ----I just retired...female and want to go green.....this is the way to go....buy this...you won't be disapointed...even my husband had to admit;;;;;;the grass looked...prettty good!
customer_reviews.author: dana romer

customer_reviews.title: Nice manual mower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mower because of the reviews and it was a staysharp mower. I always had difficulties getting the gas mower started so I decided to get a manual one this time. My grass was much higher than the stated recommend grass height so my lawn didn't come out looking so great. The machine was also heavy and hard to push. I was able to push it (I'm in my 60's) but my mom who is 80+ found it hard to push. She preferred our old gas mower. So far I have no complaints because my mentally challenged sister was able to use the mower where in the past she couldn't use the gas mower.
customer_reviews.author: R. Y. Tan

customer_reviews.title: Great reel mower
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent option for Bermuda grass, and probably most grass types. I keep my grass at 1/2" which is the lowest setting. It's helped me have the best yard in the neighborhood. It is easily adjustable to keep the blades hitting evenly. You get what you pay for. If you buy an $80 reel mower, it will lock up with every stick or piece of mulch. This mower rips through small debris like butter. Cuts evenly. If you have an uneven yard, you may need to cross cut certain spots. Great workout. Very durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hoag

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to push good working mower. I am able to mow in the morning when it is cool and not bother neighbors and iI can mow faster than my older reel mower.
customer_reviews.author: C. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small lawn!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my small backyard. My 14 year old son even enjoys mowing the lawn now. It always starts!
customer_reviews.author: BetsyCrocker

customer_reviews.title: It does what it promises
customer_reviews.text: This mower meets all the requirements we had when beginning our search. Primarily we wanted a manual machine requiring no fossil fuel and of course would cut our yard. We have mostly native plants (what most people call weeds!!) but like to keep the yard neighborly. Add a good physical workout to this mower and that's what we get. It doesn't cut the long, tough stems which have sprouted up but that will go to seed soon and be gone. Easy to put together All expectations met Very cost effective Quality machine
customer_reviews.author: nancianne burn

customer_reviews.title: Makes easy work of non-powered mowing.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected, easy to assemble, and operate. No issues cutting the grass and tall weeds. The foam handle, as others have noted, is not good. Overall this is a good buy. Like it!
customer_reviews.author: Quadstar

customer_reviews.title: Ginsu knife precision with pinpoint cornering.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the higher end model for me. Grass flying everywhere. Glorious gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good for exercise
customer_reviews.text: Good: No need for gas nor electricity. Adjustable height. Bad: Things (pine cones) easily get stuck and require (difficult) manual removal. Cannot reverse mow.
customer_reviews.author: Jia Y. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Quiet mower
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this mower. The reason I gave it four stars is because it does not get some weeds. So I have to go back with a weed walker and get the missing ones. But I do enjoy using it and love the quietness.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Jones

customer_reviews.title: A handy mower.
customer_reviews.text: A lot better than my gas powered mower because of its ease of use and storage. No gas, no noise. No need for a grass catcher when you mow at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: al c

customer_reviews.title: Great mower!
customer_reviews.text: I love this push mower! The other reviews were right about having to make sure that there are no sticks in the way but it is super easy to use and I don't feel guilty about using gas AND I don't have to worry about running out of electrical charge. Wish I had gotten this bad boy a while ago!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Great mower have used for one season, and still sharp. Cuts much better than traditional reel mowers. Is a lot easier to push forward than any other reel I've used. Only con are that the rear wheels are cheap and can cut into the lawn if it is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Americankraut

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp blades
customer_reviews.text: Use this for small areas of my garden and to mow between trees. The first time I couldn't believe how well it works. Very sharp blades.
customer_reviews.author: Pazzy

customer_reviews.title: Works great on manicured lawns...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect on thick manicured lawns, not as great on thin grass or bumpy terrain, but that’s to be expected for a manual mower...
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this lawn mower. One of the neighborhood kids was mowing my lawn with a gas-powered mower, and there's no comparison. This one does a much better job;
customer_reviews.author: Cat fancier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to push and cuts great.
customer_reviews.text: The mower requires less effort to push compared to older mowers I have owned. It cuts great though it is a bit heavy and turning around 180 degrees requires some effort.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Eisen

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and sweet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome if you understand how these cut and limitations of what they can do highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: don davis

customer_reviews.title: Works great on certain lawns
customer_reviews.text: The mower itself is great. Pushes easily and it mows grass evenly. Can be adjusted but NOT for a really short cut. HOwever, you really need to determine if your lawn is appropriate for this type of mower. Your lawn has to LEVEL, not lumpy or uneven because this mower will not mow evenly if your lawn is not fairly flat and you won't be happy with it. It is a great alternative for small lawns and environmentally friendly and quiet!!
customer_reviews.author: Bookmaven

customer_reviews.title: Great option for small lawn, and oh so "green".
customer_reviews.text: Super little mower. Easy to assemble. Solid frame and blades. May feel heavy if you lift it up. A stick in the path of the blades causes a temporary stop in rotation but easily cleared.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower Mom

customer_reviews.title: New Experience
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the Mower I thought it would be hard to put together. It wasn't, I had it together in less than 1/2 hour. The only concern was the blades, they turn so easily I was very careful not to get fingers in that area. I just used the Mower today (4/6/14), the grass wasn't long but it worked good. I'm going to have to use it a little more to really have a judgement but manual is my new way of mowing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: So basically I am unable to moved the blade which leaves me with a useless lawnmower.
customer_reviews.text: The mower cuts really well. However, after only two mowings, i hit a root and the stationary blade and rotating blade were pushed together hindering the rotating blade from turning. I attempted to loosen the screws to unlock the proper mechanism to move the rotating blade back. Unfortunately the screws are very low quality and became stripped after two attempts to loosen them. So basically I am unable to moved the blade which leaves me with a useless lawnmower.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: it is good.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. It cuts short grass well, but really doesn't handle grass more than 8-10 inches high. It is light, but you will still work up quite a sweat mowing in the heat, or a big yard. As long as you want that, it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Retsyo

customer_reviews.title: sturdy little mower!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today! It was easy to put together, did it all by myself in under 30 minutes. Works very well! I had to do several passes, starting with the highest setting, and work my way down, but I had expected as much since the yard was a little over grown. It is a good work out too! The only downside, is if you let your grass get too tall, expect to have to get out your weed wacker to get the tall stragglers. I still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Quiet Mower
customer_reviews.text: I have a large enclosure with cats that I rescued. I installed sod and then realized I could not use my gasoline mower inside because the cats would be stressed. The Fiskars 17 Inch Push Lawn Mower is the solution to my problem. It is silent, cuts grass cleanly and is easy to push. It is also easy to assemble. All in all, a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s quiet and not as heavy as my gas mower. However, it misses a lot of grass and is heavier than I thought it’d be. I am forced to go over the same spot multiple times. If given the choice again, I would not have bought this mower.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: I am 80 years old and this is really easy to use ! Lightweight and mows so well ! Quiet and good for ozone !
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Best mower ever for small, level lawn.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a breeze to mow my small city lawn with this reel mower. I love that there is zero maintenance and no motor noise. It pushes much easier than I expected and provides a clean, even cut. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Terri S.

customer_reviews.title: The best. Sharp as my intelligence
customer_reviews.text: The best. Sharp as my intelligence!!! Cuts any way you need it to, even when you let your grass get REALLY long. . . .
customer_reviews.author: frankly62

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Slight damage from shipping but other than that it is a dream grass cutting machine!
customer_reviews.author: Alex K Scull

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Easy set up, doesnt jam like the home depot model who seized at a needle thin twig
customer_reviews.author: rhonda Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great for the environment.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Works very well on flat surfaces and while moving in one direction. It will not cut through tough vegetation. Turning is not exactly easy. It definitely gets the job done. It’s a great workout and it’s GREEN!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Makes the cut after wheel replacement
customer_reviews.text: Cuts grass reel well. About the same amount of work as my power mower. Love the lack of noise and pollution with the Fiskars. One of the rear wheels fell off with first use (and second and third). Bolt would not go in all the way. Called customer service. On hold for half an hour. Replacement wheel and parts sent. Took a couple weeks to receive. Works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: K Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars 17 Inch Push Reel Mower
customer_reviews.text: Fiskars 17 Inch Staysharp Push Reel Lawn Mower was bought from Acme Tools on Amazon. Cuts well, never needs fuel! Fast delivery from Acme Tools. No damage, no problem putting mower together.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great little mower.
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job first time out. Had to figure out the height difference, but at the lowest setting it cuts like a dream. So worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Bitchin’!
customer_reviews.text: Love using this. Pine cones can jam it up, but overall a great workout while mowing your yard.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great mower for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: > Quiet, Can mowe my lawn any time > Nice work out. I have very small yard (150 sq ft) so I get a nice, quick work out. The higher the grass the harder I have to work. > No gasoline cost Cons: > If grass is too high (10-12 inches) the blades get stuck. > It does not cut small plants/weeds (8-10 inches) that grows along with the grass in my yard. Overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Oz Boy

customer_reviews.title: good unit
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine, reliable of course, seemed a bit expensive. The cut isn't great. On balance, I'm glad I own it.
customer_reviews.author: robert e criss

customer_reviews.title: Great Manual Mower
customer_reviews.text: We use this mower to get a little bit extra exercise. As an added benefit, our lawn has been looking so much better over the past couple of months. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: A WV

customer_reviews.title: Great cut,and good workout!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quite quickly. It was in great shape.(New). Easy to assemble, and cuts grass easily. A litle harder to push than a gas mower, but a great workout for an old man! Very pleased with this product and would reccomend it to anyone wanted to save our environment and a little gas.
customer_reviews.author: Ezra

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small , not too weedy areas
customer_reviews.text: It works well on my small strip of grass . If grass gets too high I have to go over a few times. Works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this mower!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take care of our tiny mobile home park yard. We've had neighbors ask to try it out. Does a great job. Good exercise, yet easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: this is the best mower ever
customer_reviews.text: If your lawn is very level and is free of debris and is healthy and well-maintained, this is the best mower ever! I absolutely love to use it. I am using it in a small Townhome yard setting where noise and gas motors completely suck ass. This is way better for you, your neighbors and Mother Nature. And it is Fiskars... You KNOW their s*** stays sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mower! Very easy to use and maneuver- and I’m a nearing 50, petite woman. Like all push mowers, it won’t get every long stalk, so if you’re looking for pristine, might want to opt for the climate-destroying variety,
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Just what they described.
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Easy to put together, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Worked great very surprised
customer_reviews.text: Oh super nice was waiting for it ...have it now hubby put it together and he did in 20 minutes and it took us 25 minutes to do our south Florida grass/weeds- you can listen to music while mowing, no fumes or sticky carburetors to deal with. Totally eco friendly and an easy going workout. thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: it works good but does leave streaks of uncut grass that you ...
customer_reviews.text: it works good but does leave streaks of uncut grass that you have to go over again. make sure you have a small yard cause you will be going over it again...so your going to be cutting your yard twice in a way.
customer_reviews.author: YEP HELLO

customer_reviews.title: Small, cheap person approved
customer_reviews.text: Works for little lawns. Pretty surprised at how well it cut my grass.
customer_reviews.author: Iva Mananquil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, green alternative
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not very *green* in most areas of my life, I didn't want to fool with gasoline & oil in my new garden home so I figured "old fashioned" might be the way to go and I'm glad I did. The mower cuts well and arrived very sharp. Assembly took about 20 minutes (with the right wrenches handy) and the adjustable deck provides options for neglected or well kempt lawns. I would like to see a guard that would keep some grass blades from being kicked back toward my feet, but overall it's not a dealbreaker. Fair price and almost *fun* to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ian D. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for Fiskars
customer_reviews.text: No more gas, and no more pulling a string hoping that the engine on the lawn mower will start. Just get behind this Fiskars lawn mower, and with a little push you'll be done. Perfect results.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Great on grass, not so good on thinner weeds
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, built sturdy, easy to clean, sharp blades, but it would not cut thin weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Jodali

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It works well. It is tricky getting the blades set up exactly but once it is set up, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Best lawn mower on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best lawn mower on the market. This mower cuts like a pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: I Wanted More Selection
customer_reviews.text: Fiskars has great products, but I wish they had a smaller version of the one I got. Their website was out of stock of almost all their models, so I came to Amazon. I have less than 300 square feet of lawn and this is a little clumsy for the job. The cutters work great, it's fun to mow and there isn't any noise or messy gas to worry about. I would not recommend the big box stores knock-offs that cost $50 less.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: this mower works fine on nice grass and it is not very hard to use (although it is manual so you have to do some work, but that is expected, I guess). It will not do anything to tall weeds. If you have a lot of those you definitely need a different mower.
customer_reviews.author: alelo

customer_reviews.title: This mower is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 y/o female, just retired. The mower flys over the bermuda and st. augustine grass, unless I let it get too high (like when I was gone on vacation for 7 days) then i had to push a little harder. It is great exercise and I am making my lawn beautiful. My lawn is not small either. My sister's 3 yr. old grandson mowed 3 strips. I held the handle up high enough so that he didn't raise the mowing part up off the ground. I wouldn't mind if it was wider.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Due to its short wheel base, the cutting head drops into low spots easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the electric mowers in every way
customer_reviews.text: Better than the mojoe electric that I returned, in every way. Ease of use, cuts clean, cleans up easily. Gets the job done. Pleasantly surprised. Effortless to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Miceli

customer_reviews.title: and this lawn mower struggled with places where the grass had gotten super tall and gone to seed
customer_reviews.text: Initially the law was about 12" high when we moved into the place, and this lawn mower struggled with places where the grass had gotten super talla and gone to seed. After the initial cutting though, this has been a dream to use. It's quiet, does the job amazingly well and is pretty easy to push. I've also gotten a number of compliments from people who say that the lawn is looking better now than ever before. The only real downside is that it's harder to edge wtih this mower than a typical gas powered mower. I have an electric trimmer that I use for all the edging now though, so it hadn't been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: alcimedes

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Great mower Gives a nice blunt cut Exactly what I needed for small yard
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick. I don't worry about oil or if I have enough gas in a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hafner

customer_reviews.title: Better than the good old days
customer_reviews.text: Love this, but just wanted you to know that it is not a replacement for a weedeater. I love the whisper it makes when cutting. Easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: I like the durable blades and it is easy to push
customer_reviews.text: I like the durable blades and it is easy to push, cuts grass great doesnt quite get the tougher weeds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this model. Cuts like a champ and quite the looker!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McCann

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: A BIT HARD TO HANDLE WHEN PUSH IN NON MOWING MOD.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Spreen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: The mower is easy to use, and no noise and bad smell, no oil change needed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sylv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy assembly detailed instruction book, excellent quality, lightweight and cuts great!
customer_reviews.author: kaksells

customer_reviews.title: exercise and quiet
customer_reviews.text: this is great! it's easy to put together and it cuts the grass completely and at a great length. plan on having it awhile as fiskars do offer a warranty on the blade!
customer_reviews.author: N. Craft

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to push and cuts very well. Easier to maintain then a gas one
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy ,easy to assemble,sharp,mowed a lawn over eight inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Phil F.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. A gentle pushed gets a clean cuts of my lawn. Love this environmental lawn mower. I think more people should invest on one.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed using this mower
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this mower. It doesn't get close to any edges. But to not have to smell gasoline is a great thing.
customer_reviews.author: KimBomar

customer_reviews.title: Best lawnmower yet!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this mower isn't any harder to push than a regular power mower but the best thing is that it's fun and every-time I've mowed a random neighbor shows up and after a few choice statements from me begs to take a turn. i usually end up sitting on the front step watching them mow my lawn.....very Tom Sawyer! The best thing is there isn't any mower noise so I can hear them coming up and snare them into my lawn mowing web.
customer_reviews.author: Mary OZ

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Like this mower -- cuts far cleaner than my previous reel mower. Simple to assemble. Only issue is turning in confined spaces -- that could be easier.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and seems to work great - it makes it fun to mow (I am a nerd, tho!)
customer_reviews.author: J. Heald

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind the extra effort with a push mower, I know what they do. However this won't cut a milkweed. It does cut something, but ANYTHING remotely damp, nope. I love all the other fiskars stuff I have, almost, and I have LOTS and really hoped this would be the answer for the small lawn I have, but I don't think so. Sorry, you can't take down Arizona weeds....and I am talking about little things not trees.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rollins

customer_reviews.title: oh and it cuts great, too
customer_reviews.text: No noise, no fumes,no cleaning the carburetor....oh and it cuts great, too!
customer_reviews.author: ReTired

customer_reviews.title: EASY to assemble
customer_reviews.text: EASY to assemble. Does not work well on uneven ground or weeds, not a knock on this unit. Base model is SUPER easy to push!
customer_reviews.author: Tim O'Brien

product_meta.title: Fiskars 17 Inch Staysharp Push Reel Lawn Mower (6208)
product_meta.description:
Size:StaysharpThe StaySharp Reel Mower combines patent-pending technology with superior ergonomics to deliver best-in-class cutting performance without gasoline, oil, charging, the hassle of cords or the noise created by other mowers. It features an InertiaDrive Reel for 50 percent more cutting power than standard reel mowers and a StaySharp Cutting System to eliminate the cost and inconvenience of annual blade sharpening. The combination of these technologies makes the StaySharp Reel Mower 30 percent easier to push than other reel mowers, helping you get more done with less effort.

AMAZON.COM


The advanced design of our reel mower makes it 30% easier to push and offers an easy way to mow your lawn. 30% EASIER TO PUSH
Advanced design makes our reel mower easier to push than others. View larger. 



STAYS SHARP LONGER
StaySharp Cutting System provides lasting performance without annual sharpening. View larger. 

The StaySharp Reel Mower combines patent-pending technology with superior ergonomics to deliver best-in-class cutting performance without gasoline, oil, charging, the hassle of cords or the noise created by other mowers. It features an InertiaDrive Reel for 50% more cutting power than standard reel mowers and a StaySharp Cutting System to eliminate the cost and inconvenience of annual blade sharpening. The combination of these technologies makes the StaySharp Reel Mower 30% easier to push than other reel mowers, helping you get more done with less effort. Includes a 1.5 to 3.5-inch cut height range, 17-inch cut width and a limited two-year warranty.


What makes the StaySharp Reel Mower Special?

 *  30% Easier to Push: The advanced technologies of this reel mower combine to reduce push force by 30% compared to competitive reel mowers.
 *  50% More Cutting Power: Large-diameter InertiaDrive Reel with thick blades delivers 50% more cutting energy to power through small twigs, weeds or dense grass that would jam competitive reel mowers.
 *  Stays Sharp Longer: The StaySharp Cutting System is precision-engineered to cut grass without the blades touching, greatly reducing friction and blade wear, delivering long-lasting performance without the cost and inconvenience of annual blade sharpening.
 *  Cuts All Grass Types: Though competitive reel mowers struggle with certain types of grass, the superior cutting system of this reel mower cuts all common residential grasses, even tough southern varieties. 



InteriaDrive Reel offers 50% more cutting power. View larger. Cuts all grass types, even tough southern varieties. View larger. Large cut height range offers mowing versatility.View larger. FEATURES
StaySharp Max (18-inch) StaySharp Plus (17-inch) StaySharp (17-inch) STAYSHARP CUTTING SYSTEM
StaySharp Cutting System is precision engineered to cut grass without the blades touching, greatly reducing friction and blade wear, delivering long-lasting performance without the cost and inconvenience of annual blade sharpening. Yes Yes Yes INERTIADRIVE REEL
Large-diameter InertiaDrive Reel with thick blades delivers more cutting energy to power through small twigs, weeds or dense grass that would jam other reel mowers. 2X more power 75% more power 50% more power EASIER TO PUSH
Advanced technologies combine to drastically reduce push force compared to other reel mowers. 60% easier to push 40% easier to push 30% easier to push CUTS ALL GRASS TYPES
Though other reel mowers struggle with certain types of grass, the superior cutting system of these reel mowers cut all common residential grasses, even tough southern varieties. Yes Yes Yes CUT HEIGHT RANGE
Accommodates all types of lawns and mowing habits. 

1- to 4-inch
Includes one-touch
height adjustment 1.5- to 4-inch 1.5- to 3.5-inch FORWARD GRASS DISCHARGE
Unique grass discharge chute throws clippings forward cleanly, away from your feet. Yes Yes - INSET WHEEL DESIGN
Inset wheel design allows the blades to extend across the full width of the mower for a wider cut that eliminates uncut strips under the wheels and lets you to edge closer to foundations, fences and borders than other reel mowers. Yes - - GRASS CATCHER
Available as an accessory to catch grass clippings as you cut and keep your lawn clean. Yes - Available June 2012 WARRANTY

feature_bullets: The smart design of our eco-friendly reel mower offers a cleaner cut without the hassles of gasoline, oil, battery charging, electrical cords or loud engine noise
A combination of advanced technologies make the StaySharp Reel Mower 30 percent easier to push than other reel mowers
Patent-pending InertiaDrive Reel delivers 50 percent more cutting power to blast through twigs, weeds and tough spots that would jam other reel mowers
